Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Add water and coffee grounds to the coffee maker.', '2. Start the coffee maker.', '3. Wait for 
brewing to finish.', '4. Pour the coffee into a cup.']

behavior add_water_to_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(coffee_maker)

def has_coffee_grounds_inside(coffee_maker:item):
    # Function to check if coffee grounds are already inside the coffee maker
    symbol has_coffee_grounds=exists o: item : is_coffee_filter(o) and inside(o, coffee_maker)
    return has_coffee_grounds

behavior add_coffee_grounds_to_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item, coffee_grounds:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(coffee_grounds, coffee_maker) # Ensure coffee grounds are added inside

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)

        bind coffee_grounds: item where:
            grabbable(coffee_grounds)

        if not has_coffee_grounds_inside(coffee_maker):
            add_coffee_grounds_to_coffee_maker(coffee_maker, coffee_grounds)
        
        add_water_to_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Fill the coffee maker with water and coffee grounds.', '2. Turn on the coffee maker to start br
ewing.', '3. Pour the brewed coffee into a cup.']

def has_water_or_coffee(inside_item:item):
    # Check if there is water or coffee grounds in a specified inside item
    symbol has_content = exists o: item : (has_water(o) or is_coffee_filter(o)) and inside(o, inside
_item)
    return has_content

behavior add_water_and_coffee(inside_item:item):
    body:
        if not has_water_or_coffee(inside_item):
            bind water: item where:
                has_water(water) and pourable(water)
            bind coffee: item where:
                is_coffee_filter(coffee) and pourable(coffee)     
            achieve_once inhand(water)
            achieve has_water(inside_item)
            achieve_once inhand(coffee)
            achieve inside(coffee, inside_item)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        add_water_and_coffee(coffee_maker)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Add water to the coffee maker.  ', '2. Place a coffee filter and add coffee grounds.  ', '3. St
art the coffee maker to brew the coffee.  ', '4. Pour the brewed coffee into a cup.']

behavior add_water_to_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        achieve open(coffee_maker)
        # Open the coffee maker to add water
        achieve has_water(coffee_maker)
        # Fill the coffee maker with water
        achieve closed(coffee_maker)
        # Close the coffee maker after adding water
        
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        # Select the coffee maker
        add_water_to_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Add coffee grounds to the coffee maker.', '2. Fill the coffee maker with water.', '3. Start the
 coffee maker brewing process.', '4. Pour the brewed coffee into a cup.']

behavior add_coffee_grounds_to_coffee_maker(coffee_grounds:item, coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(coffee_grounds, coffee_maker)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        # Select a coffee maker
        
        bind coffee_grounds: item where:
            grabbable(coffee_grounds)
        # Select coffee grounds that can be grabbed
        
        add_coffee_grounds_to_coffee_maker(coffee_grounds, coffee_maker)
